name: BGTaskScheduler
desc: A class for scheduling tasks run by submitting task requests that launch your app in the background.

items.name: shared
items.desc: The shared background task scheduler instance.

items.name: submit
items.desc: Submit a previously registered background task for execution.

items.name: cancel
items.desc: Cancel a previously scheduled task request.

items.name: errorDomain
items.desc: The background tasks error domain as a string.
